Medium: Oil, synthetic polymer paint, graphite and silkscreen ink, and color laser prints
Dimensions: (installation dimensions:)  1: (de Chirico) 7' 8"   x 6' 11" (231.1 x 210.8 cm); 2: (Hopper) 38 x 48"   (96.5 x 121.9 cm); 3: (Magritte) 6' 10" x 7' 8"   (208.3 x 233.7 cm)
Title: GHOSTS. Composed of GHOST (de Chirico: The Enigma of the Day), GHOST (Hopper: House by the Railroad), GHOST (Magritte: The Menaced Assasin)
